sources.name: not_filtered
sources.script:
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~>  not_filtered

typeProperties.script:
section Section1;
shared not_filtered = let
  AdfDoc = Sql.Database("mysqlserver997.database.windows.net", "graduates", [CreateNavigationProperties = false]),
  InputTable = AdfDoc{[Schema = "dbo", Item = "Try2"]}[Data]
in
  InputTable;
shared filtered = let
  AdfDoc = Sql.Database("mysqlserver997.database.windows.net", "graduates", [CreateNavigationProperties = false]),
  InputTable = AdfDoc{[Schema = "dbo", Item = "filtered"]}[Data]
in
  InputTable;
shared UserQuery = let
  Source = filtered,
  #"Sorted rows" = Table.Sort(Source, {{"vote_average", Order.Descending}})
in
  #"Sorted rows";
